author: hlship
msg: Change InjectContainerWorker to obtain (and validate) the container indirectly, via a ComponentValueProvider

author: hlship
msg: Convert MixinWorker to use a ComponentValueProvider to inject a component mixin into a container component.

author: hlship
msg: Use a ComponentValueProvider to inject a sub-component into a container component.

author: kahatlen
msg: DERBY-3024 (partial) Validation of shared plans hurts scalability
Removed an unneeded call to rePrepare() in EmbedStatement.executeStatement().
The call is not needed because rePrepare() will be called again in
GenericPreparedStatement.execute(), so the plan will be reprepared anyways
before it's executed, if it has become stale.

author: hlship
msg: Add ability to assign a read-only value to a component field, from a ComponentValueProvider, within a specific method
